roleset.name: send a message via phone, computer, etc., etc
roleset.note: MESSAGE-V NOTES: Roleset based on PropBanking of Tweets for crisis informatics. Framed by Claire with consultation from Sarah. (from message.01-v)
MESSAGING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to message.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from messaging.01-n)
MESSAGE-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from message.01-n)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: She messaged me back saying she didn't do it.

example.name: Message only
example.text: She messaged that she can't live without me.
example.arg: that she can't live without me.

example.text: messaging via email to patient ok
